values.name: text
values.value: “Gold makes fine jewelry with just the right balance of simple and special ”
values.translate: “Gold makes fine jewelry with just the right balance of simple and special ”

values.name: title
values.value: Made in Los Angeles with love and Solid Gold
values.translate: Made in Los Angeles with love and Solid Gold

values.name: description
values.value: “No object can tell a story quite like a piece of jewelry” - says BabyGold™ founder, Helen Ashikian. Our always-14k solid gold, fine-jewelry is sustainably made in our family-owned factory in Downtown Los Angeles, California. We cut traditional mark-ups and offer honest pricing, bringing you the highest quality pieces to love and cherish for decades to come.“
